annotations.description: What an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will more of the same in their other games. The home side were superior in this game. Halil Altintop (Augsburg) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a low strike towards the middle of the goal. Roman Weidenfeller guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to FC Augsburg.

Andre Schurrle (Dortmund) is furious with himself as he misses a golden opportunity from inside the six yard box. He sends a rebound a few inches wide of the left post.

Christian Pulisic (Dortmund) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.

Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) is moving okay again after that injury scare.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Konstantinos Stafylidis (Augsburg) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Guido Winkmann had an easy decision to make.

The most active player in today's match is definitely Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund). He's trying to be on the ball as much as possible and you can literally see the enthusiasm in his play. He keeps exchanging some one touch passes and waits for the right moment to send a killer pass. What a player!
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: The total number of attempts is 23:8.
Jonathan Schmid (Augsburg) delivers a poor cross from a free kick as one of the defenders comfortably clears it away.
The referee blows his whistle as Mikel Merino (Dortmund) was too aggressive in his challenge. A free kick is awarded to FC Augsburg.
Half chance! Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) plays a pass into the box, but Marwin Hitz reacts well to snuff out the attack.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) wasted an opportunity to score from the free kick from about 25 metres out. His attempt hit the defensive wall.
Jeffrey Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) makes an overly aggressive challenge and Guido Winkmann blows his whistle for a foul.
Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) floats the free kick into the box, but it's easily cleared by the first man.

Jan Moravek (Augsburg) is obviously not following the Golden Rule: „Treat others as you want to be treated.“ He makes a bad challenge and leaves Guido Winkmann with no other option than to blow for a foul. Dortmund win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
Dong Won Ji (Augsburg) picks up a long through ball, but Roman Weidenfeller deserves praise for a brilliant reaction and interception.
Guido Winkmann blows his whistle after Jan Moravek (Augsburg) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.

What a chance that is! Matthias Ginter (Dortmund) displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross from the free kick, but he steers his header narrowly wide of the left post.

A brilliant individual effort! Dong Won Ji (Augsburg) tricks his way past challenges into the box and drags his shot narrowly wide of the right post.
Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Guido Winkmann saw the whole situation.

Both sides have been very active in the first 45 minutes, providing the fans with an exciting show. Even first half from both sides, and they've both had chances. The tactic of the home side is slow build up play and the away side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.
